status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bnqmm","text":"Prepare a   water bath (in a beaker) in the bead bath. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3r7rv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C247DC90431F11ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qd79","text":"For one reaction (200,000 HSPCs in small cuvettes) mix following components:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c47pq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pmh2","text":"** first, dilute sgRNA in Cas9 Buffer 3X and then, slowly add Cas9 protein while mixing **","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lp40","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fprr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6lnde","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["Cas9 3X buffer","1.5",""],["Ultrapure Water","0.375",""],["Guide RNA (100 uM)","0.75","(75 pmol total)"],["Cas9 (40uM)","1.875","(75 pmol total)"],["total volume","4.5",""]],"guid":"F90F9DE0432311ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Cas9 3X buffer","1.5",""],["Ultrapure Water","0.375",""],["Guide RNA can be prepared in 1.5 mL tubes. Cells resuspended in the nucleofection solution will be directly added to the RNP mix. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60uch","text":"For one reaction, transfer 200,000 cells into a 15 mL Falcon tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"249ha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ecuv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8cn0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7bhps","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"57cif","text":"For replicates, you can multiply the amount of cells and RNP mix as needed and mix in a single tube before electroporating separately.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rtmk","text":"While the cells are spinning, prepare plate and cuvette. Place a 24-well plate with 1 mL per well of supplemented SFEMII in the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4det2","text":"After centrifugation, discard supernatant completely and resuspend cells in the nucleofection solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"470nn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f4m8","text":"** The pellet is very soft so be careful **","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6rcea","text":"Resuspend cells in the nucleofection solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"179c6","text":"Mix 20 uL of cells with the RNP mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5i7k8","text":"Add 24.5 µL of cells/RNP electroporation mix to the multiwell cuvette, and cap. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o1e8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjclu","text":"** Pay attention to the orientation of the cap and cuvette in the nucleofector, which is noted in the manufacturer’s instructions ** ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d130e","text":"Choose P3 cell solution and ER-100 code. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9um0m","text":"Insert cuvette into nucleofector and zap.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tg18","text":"Culture cells for several days in SFEM II/PenStrep/CC110 before genotying by desired method. Consider including un-zapped controls to test viability.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hr4h","text":"After 2 min at 37°C, remove the vial from the water bath every 15-20 seconds and gently invert 3-4 times to check the level of thawing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91js3","text":"Check that the vial is tightly capped and place in a   water bath.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8vesd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C69516A0431F11ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hg37","text":"Gently invert 5 times to mix the cells and transfer the vial content to a 15mL tube at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b76rc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B8D46D90431F11ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jjcu","text":"When the vial contents are 50-75% liquid, remove from the water bath and continue to gently invert the vial until the entire contents are liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4m399","text":"Add   of media to rinse the vial and transfer any remaining cells to the 15mL tube. Also rinse the cap.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"19cm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"B4D357B0431F11ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"650im","text":"Slowly add   media (unsupplemented SFEMII) to the cells. Securely cap the tube and gently invert 3-5 times after adding all the media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"35d4i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7","error":false,"guid":"ADD49230431F11ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gpgh","text":"Centrifuge the tube at 200g x 8 minutes at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ng84","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A4A1AEA0431F11ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8b9s","text":"Resuspend the cells (pellet) in   of supplemented media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"90u66","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6b587","text":"** Resuspend in 1ml first, transfer to the plate, wash the tube further with 1ml and then 500 ul to make sure you are transferring as many cells as possible **","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"AFA14670432011ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sq8o","text":"Count the cells using hemacytometer, adjust volume to plate 250,000 CD34+ per well of 6-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3a55a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29b1q","text":"** Generally, the count will decline slightly from day 0 to day 1, and recover from day 1 to day 2. The total number of cells on day 2 will be slightly higher than on day 0 **","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42o7h","text":"Ideally,  medium at     . Mix thoroughly before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36olo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"prmq","text":"** Do not refreeze. Store at 2 - 8°C for up to 1 month **","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":957308,"mol_weight":0,"name":"StemSpan SFEM II","linfor":"","url":"https://www.stemcell.com/products/stemspan-sfem-ii.html","sku":"09655","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"32A661E0432111ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":82,"name":"STEMCELL Technologies Inc.","link":"http://www.stemcell.com/","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"60ABD890432111ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"6496F570432111ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2f58","text":"Thaw  at  . Mix thoroughly before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"94vov","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":120679,"mol_weight":0,"name":"StemSpan™ CC110 1 mL\r","linfor":"","url":"https://www.stemcell.com/products/stemspan-cc110.html","sku":"2697","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"4DFE3300432111ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":82,"name":"STEMCELL Technologies Inc.","link":"http://www.stemcell.com/","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5719BE00432111ED9789B14EF31DB9ED","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ceep","text":"Prepare the appropriate amount of supplemented media by adding CC110 (100X ; 10 uL for 1 mL) and P/S  (100X ; 10 uL for 1 mL) to SFEM II media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7fvjl","text":"Incubate 15 min at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g234","text":"For one reaction (200,000 HSPCs in small cuvettes) mix following components:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ltgg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5do0q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1qd3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3hsba","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["190",100],"data":[["P3 Nucleofector™ Solution","16.4 uL"],["Supplement solution","3.6 uL"],["Total volume ","20 uL"]],"guid":"0544DA10432611ED810275D5880A7FAE","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["P3 Nucleofector™ Solution","16.4 uL"],["Supplement solution","3.6 uL"],["Total volume ","20 uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75qp","text":"(Optionnal) Slowly add HDR donor (ssODN) protein while mixing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aso68","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23c1f","text":"** 1 uL ssODN at 100 uM  = Final quantity: 100 pmol ssODN **","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62ah9","text":"Spin 300 x g for 6 minutes to pellet cells softly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7abe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rifq","text":"After centrifugation, discard supernatant and wash with PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v9la","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r12l","text":"** Cells can be transfered into a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube to remove more supernatant in the next steps **","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8qaek","text":"Spin 300 x g for 6 minutes to pellet cells softly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bqvl","text":"Wait 5 minutes at room temperature and then add 100 uL of supplemented SFEMII media to each cuvette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2f15i","text":"Transfer the nucleofected cells into the pre-warmed 24-well plate. Wash each cuvette with an additional 100 µL of medium, and add that as well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Cas9 RNP nucleofection (CD34+ HSPCs)
